content:
The Southeastern Conference pushed back its championship game at the Georgia Dome a week to Dec PERIOD  so schools can make up games postponed after the terrorist attacks PERIOD

The three conference games originally scheduled for Sept PERIOD  will be played Dec PERIOD  PERIOD Those games are No PERIOD  Tennessee at No PERIOD  Florida Auburn at No PERIOD  LSU and Vanderbilt at Mississippi PERIOD

The Georgia Dome was booked Dec PERIOD  for the semifinals of the state high school playoffs but was freed up because the high schools canceled their games last weekend PERIOD

The kickoff time for the SEC title game will be announced later PERIOD

Schools will be responsible for rescheduling nonconference games postponed this weekend SEC officials said PERIOD

Nonconference games included South CarolinaBowling Green AlabamaSouthern Mississippi HoustonGeorgia KentuckyIndiana ArkansasNorth Texas and Mississippi StateBrigham Young PERIOD

The SEC also announced that Tennessees Sept PERIOD  game against LSU will start at  p.m PERIOD EDT and will be shown nationally by ESPN PERIOD

The Vols   SEC and Tigers  will enter the game following two off weeks following last Saturdays postponement of games due to the tragic events earlier in the week PERIOD Both teams have scheduled open dates this weekend PERIOD

Other SEC games to be televised Sept PERIOD  include Alabama at South Carolina  p.m.JP Sports Mississippi State at Florida  p.m.CBS and Arkansas at Georgia  p.m.ESPN2 PERIOD

LSU defeated Tennessee last season  in overtime at Tiger Stadium PERIOD The Vols rallied from  halftime deficit to tie the game in the final minutes to force the extra period PERIOD Tennessee leads the alltime series  including a  mark in Knoxv

ille PERIOD
